mean_cn: v. 施催眠术，吸引，使神魂颠倒
mean_en: to hold the attention of (someone) entirely :to interest or amaze (someone) so much that nothing else is seen or noticed
short_phrase: mesmerize her with a swinging watch
sentence: Let me mesmerize you with this swinging watch and my sultry eyes.
sentence_trans: 让我用这个摇摆的表和我迷人的眼睛来催眠你。
